data.author: Oscar R.C.

changelog.release_notes:
Removed ellipsis from battery bar.
Added charging colors to deal with charging on Basalt.
Fixed logic with showing charging icon.

Added support for Pebble Time
Added a note of color to make the watchface be closest to Dedsec logo.
v.1.6. Fix a bug with tick timer

data.description:
NOW WITH COLOR!!!

The DEDSEC watchface you use and love now is even better!!!

It displays time, date, remaining battery (progress bar style) and bluetooth connection icon.

CHANGELOG 3.0
    -Added Pebble Time Round Support

CHANGELOG 2.1
    -Removed ellipsis from battery bar.
    -Added charging colors to deal with charging on Basalt.
    -Fixed logic with showing charging icon.

CHANGELOG 2.0
-Added a touch of color for new Pebble Time

CHANGELOG v.1.6
    -Fixed bug whereby the time didn't update properly.

CHANGELOG v1.5
    -Added custom Watch Dogs style font for display time
    -Changed bluetooth icon to match WiFi icon on Aiden Pearce's phone
    -Now battery indicator is fully integrated in the watchface
    -Blinking cursor to indicate seconds
    -Vibe if bluetooth keeps disconnected for more than 10 seconds

More awesome features to come. Keep downloading.

HACKER_title (Watch Dogs) font by http://davidlibeau.fr/Watch_Dogs_Font=HACKED_Title/
data.title: DEDSEC
